caption: Always a good selection and the backyard is great

Went here on a date and the selection alone is enough to have me coming back but that along with the DIY charcuterie makes this an amazing date spot or just a place to reflect on good beer with friends. Ample seating in front inside and a great backyard
Best beer bar in Crown Heights/Bedstuy, maybe even Brooklyn. Great rotating beer selection on tap and tons of beer to-go as well as affordable charcuterie (small cuts starting at like $2)
Very crowded inside (didn’t feel like 6 feet), meh service.
These guys in there are awesome. Also, they are great people to talk to.
Best bar around.  Great place to see friends and spend some time drinking tasty beer!
Good cider place serving soft pretzels. Their beer is popular and so is their grilled cheese- you won't be disappointed!
Very nice selection of beers both in bottles and on tap.  Out door seating , no heat lamps my beer kept me warm.  I will go back
Love this bar! Huge selection of beer and an awesome backyard. Friendly bartenders (sometimes). The sandwiches are off the wall.
Amazing grilled cheeses and craft beer selection.
Terrible place, they were so rude and backwards about covid restrictions. If you want to have a good night avoid this place.
Great bar.  Great service. Very good place for after work / workout cocktails.
Highly recommend come for delicious heady hand picked beers from awesome breweries and stay for the original grilled cheese (add bacon)  Will be back next time I visit my brother.  Slainté!
Great food,  drinks and service. Would recommend!!
Good place. Good food. Stereotypical beer garden food but attention could be better for the customers.🧐🧐 Decent interior. Interesting art and cartoons on the walls. A cool hipster spot.
Love it here! Incredible selection of craft bevs. Warm friendly low key neighborhood vibe
Great beer selection, amazing backyard, delicious pretzels
Good beer large selection of beers, good staff food was also good, nice courtyard
Absolutely the greatest bar in NYC. Great bottles, fair prices,  not too crowded, great ambience.

This is one of my favorite places in my neighborhood.  Bill, Tom and the Grilled Cheese Chef offer a friendly, unpretentious place to relax.  I'm not a beer drinker, but they always have great cider options available!  The backyard is small but comfortable.  I really appreciate a place that  brings a sense of normalcy in the bat$h!t zombie apocalypse known as 2020.
Favorite bar in the neighborhood. Great beer, helpful bartenders and the right vibe for a relaxed evening.
great spot for a quick beer or four from their amazing selection.  the backyard is peaceful and well decorated.  pick up some cans or fill a growler. lots of good experiences at Covenhoven!
Best bar and staff.
Best of the best when it comes to beer bars with to-go options

Come here if you are looking for a legitimate beer establishment. The number of beer options may be overwhelming for most but the staff is EXTREMELY knowledgeable, friendly and down to earth.  Great beer, the hot pretzels are delicious AND board games. What more do you need?
I visited covenhoven to meet a biz associate for the first time. It was a warm and pleasant reception from the staff. I liked the selection they had to offer and the space was charming.

Love this place. So much selection, constant rotating tap, lovely indoor and outdoor seating, the nicest staff and bartenders and managers, such a low key relaxing vibe. So happy here, the neighborhood place.

I have been going here for years. It has gotten much more popular, but for good reason! The brews on tap are always tasty and a good price especially considering how expensive drinking local has become in Brooklyn.
Cool bar with a great beer selection. The food looked great
Good neighborhood bar
The best!
Beer selection and quality of service were both incredible. Bartender was friendly and knowledgeable and able to help with picking beers based on taste profile.
Such a fun NYE!
Sip sip
Great beer selection, with 16 taps and an endless fridge with cans and bottles. And the friendliest staff behind the bar!
best staff ever
Good beer, chill atmosphere
Nice outdoor seating
Great selection of very good beer
Fun place for a pint or two and excellent grilled cheeses.
Crowded
Great space with and excellent selection of taps and bottles. Weather-permitting, don't overlook the garden out back.
Great selection of drafts, bottles and cans for consumption on site or purchase to-go. Lovely back patio.
The best back yard in Brooklyn with the best tap-list to go with it. If you're looking for an unusual beer and a friendly vibe, Covenhoven is sure to deliver.
outdoor area in back

This is a great beer bar in crown heights. They have an ever-changing menu and a high bottle program. But bottles to go and save big on the price of having them there. The outside is amazing in the summer and the location is great. You really cant go wrong with this place.
Nice garden and interesting beer selection, though service is a bit unpleasant, and flights would be nice.  Replies: Thanks for following up! (Understood about no flights, but worth calling out.)
Lots of great beer and a nice backyard.
Great beer selection with a great garden out back! Amazing.

Hip place to go with friends while also chill enough to go solo to read a book and enjoy a good beer. They offer plenty of indoor seating and several cute tables outside in the back patio. Small menu offering yummy bites and in addition to their epic beer selection, they have Gf beer and non-alcoholic drinks to choose from. Can’t go wrong!
Cool place, nice vibe
Great drinks and service!
Great beer selection. Nice backyard space. Awesome grilled cheese sandwiches.
A varied selection of beers and even ciders on tap.  The fact you can pick and choose your own charcuterie board (cheeses and cured meats) along with a crusty baguette is just wonderful.
Good beer bar
The ber selection was great
Hot, humid and sultry....
Good hipster nonsense

Hello Covenhoven, I had really nice experience with you.Very friendly atmosphere.They allow you to enter with your dog which is really cool.They have good cocktails and food so they will take good care of you.Easygoing bartender, so if you don`t know what to drink just tell him to freestyle with your drink, i am sure that he will come with great drink.

Was in to celebrate the 4th with my sister and some friends. The beer, hospitality, and vibe were all excellent. Providing hotdogs for the patrons to celebrate the holiday was a very nice touch. The music during the afternoon was excellent! It set a vibrant, happy tone to celebrate the holiday.
Brooklyn stand up
Took them 30 minute to make a grilled cheese sandwich... Is why it's not 5 stars.
The space and beer selection are amazing. Love the little cheese fridge to DIY your own cheese plate. Beautiful yard and great service!
Excellent beer selection on draft and in bottles you can take away.  Chill atmosphere with secluded beer garden.

Good beer selection with a nice and friendly staff. Great atmosphere for meeting people and a nice backyard. The place is often full which makes service slow (though the noise level is never inordinate, which is nice), so don't go if you're looking for a good place for a large group. Also, no real vegan options on the menu, which is sad. The fresh baked half baguettes are nice, though, and worth getting.

This is one of the most truly “chill” places around. Same few bartenders there every time I go, who are super cool guys, and little game corner in the back. Somehow they manage to make it simultaneously laid back and very high-quality in there. Endless interesting canned beers and ciders to pick from, a veritable list of rotating drafts, and little cheese and self-serve bread to munch with them. The cherries on top are an exquisite outdoor garden area in the back and the limited but incredible list of bites: the best grilled cheese I’ve had in my life, for example.

Love this place! Covenhoven has an ever rotating tap selection that is a delight to the most ardent beer nerd. Local beers, hard to get beers and ones that are completely different can be found along with an amazing bottle selection. The back yard is lovely in warm weather and we love sitting out front with our dog when weather permits. A true neighborhood gem!
Great little tap room. Amazing beer selection and the pretzels were awesome.
Great beer bar!
Fantastic bar
Amazing beer selection and loved the cheese!

Great beer selection here, both for to-go cans or on tap. Backyard, porch, and railroad interior make this bar a comfortable, but busy neighborhood spot. Food is also available, try the beet/arugula salad, grilled cheese, or brats on pretzel bun!
I drink here too much
Cozy and friendly space with an outdoor setting.
Great beers
Great spot for an afternoon beer in their backyard. Gets pretty crowded later in the day. Great selection of tap/cans/bottles and also has ciders.🍻

Low key bar with great beer selection, including some from local microbreweries like Threes. Bartenders are friendly and willing to impart they're knowledge and let you try samples. Great garden out back for the summer and a little patio out front too.
Had a blast.  Trivia night, great selection of local beers, and the bartender made sure we got what we liked! Will return next visit to Brooklyn.

Really nice selection of beers and friendly knowledgeable staff to help you pick out something to suit your mood. More on the expensive side but you get a free loaf of bread if you hang around until close which is a bonus!
Great beer selection!
Great selection great staff
Love it. Great variety of beers and an entire wall of coolers for beers to take home. Small selection of charcuterie for eat in or take out. Awesome staff.❤️
Best bar in nyc period
Great atmosphere that gets better as you enjoy their wide beer selection. Tasty pretzels and other solid bar food. Staff was knowledgable, friendly and made some great recommendations.
Dark and low slung.  Chill craft beer bar where dreams can come true and hearts can be crushed.
You are in Brooklyn, you want great beer, if you aren't here, good luck. The selection is fantastic, both on draft and in cans/ bottles. Great helpful staff, friendly patrons, a great pub.

Absolutely love this place, amazing can selection and draft selection. The tap take overs they have are really fun. The bartenders are really cool and friendly and up for conversations about beer stuff :)
Absolutely the best beer bar in Brooklyn. Cozy, good food, and great beer you won't find anywhere else.
I really love this place, good selection of beer, great meal and  cozy atmosphere! ♥️
Best beer selection in the area. Awesome little spot. One of our favs
Board games! Cider! Grilled cheese! Everything about the reviews for this place is pretty straightforward. Except the name. How the hell do you pronounce Covenhoven?!

Just happened to wander in here after visiting the botanic gardens and am really glad I did. Chill atmosphere in the afternoon and good selection of beer. Grilled cheeses are DELICIOUS and huge! Definitely worth more than the $8 I paid. If I thought I could have finished another one, I’d have ordered a second.

Best Craft Beer bar in NYC. When it comes down to it, Covenhoven is my absolute favorite. I come here from Astoria because they have everything I look for in a great beer bar... Awesome draught list! Amazing selection of local, regional and far away beers to stay or go! Beautiful backyard! Dogs allowed in front patio area! Some board games! Good music! And most importantly...a top notch staff! They don’t have liquor...this is a beer bar. But if beer is your thing...you won’t be disappointed. Oh, and their grilled cheeses...👌🏾

Super chill spot with super knowledgeable bar tenders and super delicious beers.  Seriously though, the selection here is thoughtful and local and not in the least bit pretentious.  Will recommend to anyone I know who is heading this way.
Incredible beer selection
The perfect craft beer pub on Brooklyn. Also does take out beers.
Perfect place! Large selection of beer ...
Lovely back yard but I wish it were open more. Not the place to get miller or bud. If you're "into" beer (hello brooklyn) youll be happy here.

Not sure where to start. Fantastic beer selection, super friendly staff, I can always find seating, they have battle ship, and I have never ran into my ex there. One of my favorite places to hang out in the area.

the selection of beers and ciders here is mind-blowing. the place itself has something so cozy and pleasant about it, that I just want to keep coming back. grab a brewski and go enjoy the backyard area!
Great beer selection, reasonable prices and a very cool "beer hall" atmosphere/decor! I especially appreciated the self-serve water station they have.
A bit dim but otherwise very secluded, almost hidden outside seating, great staff!
Great selection and atmosphere, friendly and knowledgeable bar tender, clean bathrooms.
Great beer selection... if you like IPA.

Tasty beers but pretty overpriced compared to other bars close by. The guys behind the counter were funny and helpful, would give them 5 stars however something was lacking in the ambience of the place.

Favorite bar in Crown Heights.   Tons of choices in cans & bottles in their freezers and they always have fresh, new, delicious craft beers on tap.   Bartenders know their stuff and are happy to guide you to a beer you'll like.  Quality meat & cheese selection.   And if you don't wanna DIY, the grilled cheeses are sure bet.   They have a backyard, spacious indoor seating with good lighting, and I frequently see people out front with their dogs--what more do you want to entice you to stop in and see for yourself?
Our go-to spot for trivia on Tuesday nights, this spot has amazing beers to stay or to take home, and probably the best grilled cheese I've ever had in my whole life.
Great beer AND boardgames!
Medium sized craft beer bar. Usually excellent draft list, lots of local brews. Plenty of refrigerated bottles and cans to drink in or take away. Nice backyard.

Excellent beer bar with a cozy backyard that makes any warm evening better. They have 15+ taps at any one time and those rotate through very regularly for more variety. Also have a fridge that has way too many beers to count in cans and bottles in addition to some fun board games. 5/5
Phenomenal in house beer selection.  Fun friendly crowd!
Nice selection of beers. Good vibes.
Awesome beers! Great service.

(Translated by Google) Bar with very nice garden which offers a large choice of beers and good quality snacks: grilled cheese sandwiches, cheese dishes, salad, pretzels. The plus: the charming garden at the back!  (Original) Bar avec jardin très sympa qui propose un grand choix de bières et du snacking de Bonne qualité : sandwichs au fromage grillé, plats de fromage, salade, Bretzels. Le plus : le charmant jardin à l’arrière !
Fave neighborhood watering hole for discovering new beer.
Always a nice vibe there. And a good beer selection.

**Update- The owners reached out to me to get more feedback about my negative experience. They have since hired a female bartender (the all male staff was the subject of my rude review). Glad they took my bad experience to heart and made effort to mitigate  The staff here is insanely rude. I get it, you're into beer, but so am I other wise I wouldn't be in a beer bar.That doesn't give you the right to completely ignore me, then when you finally decide to take someone's order after talking to your friends, be snarky to me. The selection is fine, but I DO NOT like the vibe here at all. There are plenty of places with great beer that don't belittle their customers and aren't extremely rude. GO ELSEWHERE

This is THE spot to enjoy craft beer in the Crown Heights area. It’s a haven of rotating taps from locally sourced breweries and plenty of domestic and imported cans and bottles to go on the fridge. The bar staff is helpful and knowledgeable, and lets you try anything before ordering. Best kept secrets: the board games stashed by the bathroom and the roasted red pepper goat cheese grilled cheese sandwich.
Cute spot with a great backyard. Good pretzels too.
good beers and the best grilled cheese of any of the bklyn bars

Cute spot with nice outdoor areas. Great selection of beers. Good for small groups. Every can has a cheaper "to-go" price as well as a more expensive "for here" price. They also have apparently stunning grilled cheese sandwiches but I didn't get to try one - though they smelled amazing.
Nice little bar. There's a grass patio in the backyard where you can have a smoke. Big beer selection and some limited options for food, but not a place to get a full on dinner.
The best craft beer place in the neighborhood. 16 rotating taps plus a large number of chilled cans and bottles. All cans/bottles are to stay or go. The backyard is amazing!
Great beer selection, amazing back garden patio. The cheese pretzel was also quite tasty.
Neat little place
Awesome beer selection!!
Amazing beer selection, curated cheeses, stellar bartenders, and an adorable backyard.

Best craft beer option in Crown Heights. Super friendly staff and wide selection of brews. Two prices on each can in the cooler- one for if you drink house, another if you leave with it. Very transparent. Bread and cheese for purchase in the back.
Not amazing but okay. Service was very slow and unremarkable but the bar is new, so the washrooms were clean and spacious.
Good beer bar near my house.
Cozy. Wide selection of beers

I’ve been there a few times and it has always been a nice atmosphere. Never too empty or too crowded. The staff was helpful and the drink selection (especially beer) is very good and the prices are in line with other similar bars. I’ve been told by the people I’ve gone there with that the grilled cheese is phenomenal. Plus, I left my headphones there and they found them and held them for me to pick up.
Ridiculous beer selection! And cheap too. Once the weather warms up, I'm gonna ravage that sweet lil backyard situation they got going on.

A spectacular beer selection and an incredibly knowledgeable staff. If you know what you like, you'll be able to find it there. If you don't, they'll help you. Plus they have special samplers now and then that are worth the trip for beer lovers.
Great selection of beers on tap as well as in cans.  You can only drink the alchemist heady topper and focal banger in house.  Kcbc, Greenpoint, and many others regularly stocked.
A great beer bar with a stellar tap list and a wonderful amount of cans and bottles you can take with you or enjoy on premises.
Very cool. Grass patio in nyc.
Always the best beers, and I LOVE the grilled cheese sandwiches!
Terrific beer hall with great people, outstanding service, and a fun crowd.

Wonderfully varied draught selection that can open you up to some of the more esoteric craft traditions, constantly rotating. If none of the draughts strike your fancy feel free to choose from the stupidly large can/bottle selection. Always a great atmosphere for conversation or some light yahtzee. Small but solid high-end bar food selection: I suggest the ham and grueyere grilled cheese with cornichon.
Good beer selection.
Great beer selection. I’ll b back

This is a great addition to the neighborhood. The tap list is broad and varies daily, and the refrigerated beer selection is on point. The atmosphere of the place doesn't seem to have really gelled yet, but this is a good location to enjoy a relatively quiet, tasty beer with a friend. Some of the draft beers are probably a buck overpriced, which leads me to often turn to a bottle from the fridge. Of course, there's a 2 dollar fee... Still, very glad to have this option nearby.
Food is good place is clean  and the staff  are nice
Great beer - fantastic yard - the best neighborhood spot for a boozy afternoon.
Beer. Cheese. Games. Do I need to say more?
Great beer, fine snacks.
Great bar for beer with an awesome selection of bottles to take away.
Bartender was a complete a-hole
Impressive taps and even more eclectic bottle selection.
Sweet spot
Outstanding beer selection both on tap and in the fridge. Don’t forget to try one of their signature grilled cheeses while you’re there.
Good beer selection, good vibes.
I would recommend the soft pretzel to anyone. Done right.
Unbeatable beer selection, nice outdoor seating area in front (great for summer nights!). Great pretzels, too!
Largest selection of beer in the and a cool, dark vibe. Beers are reasonably priced and don't forget to check out the board games in the back and the courtyard
Great beer selection. Nice patio out back.
Good 🍺.i think I'm too poor to drink in NY though

Friendly staff, happy to give you samples of the various beers on tap so you can find exactly what you're looking for. A nice outdoor patio in the back seats probably 20-30 people. Beers & ciders are sold in two different sizes; usually the bigger size is 25% or so bigger for only a dollar or two extra.
Great beer selection, amazing service. Reasonably priced drinks and food.
Too loud. Really disturbs the atmosphere, which would otherwise be quite pleasant. One could go deaf in a place like that.
Cozy atmosphere with a great beer selection, and you can buy them to go!
Beer drinker's paradise, I had my fill and still left with an armful of IPA's I didn't get to try!
Nice sour beer collection

Craft beer selection is awesome, lots of choices and the bartenders really know their stuff! the cheddar pretzel is so good! you can also play games (available in the shelf at theback). it's a very nice place with a backyark! come with a group like 5 max i'd say
Calm, informal environment. Good bottle selection as well as taps and food.
Great beer selection in a very nicely designed space. Good spot for a date. Board games you can play while you drink your fancy beer. Didn't eat but the grill smelled amazing.
Nice cute space and nice outside. Very trendy hipster crowd. Great beer options.
Great spot. Amazing beer selection!
Beer nerd's wet dream. And the staff don't make you feel inferior. Also, wood-burning stove in the winter. Self-service meats/cheeses is also cool.

Didn't try the food, but the beer selection was excellent. There was only one beer I recognized on the tap list. Staff and other patrons were very friendly and knowledgeable. The garden in the back was beautiful. Heard this is the only place you can go in this area for the best craft taps.
Excellent beer selection
Great beer, great outdoor space and good barfood options
Great beers. Indoor and outdoor seating. Fun activities. Good food. What more could you need?
Cutest backyard ever.
Great beer selection and backyard.
Great beer selection, backyard is wonderful.

One of the best beer bars in Brooklyn​. It's cozy inside, but they have a nice backyard with a patio, planters and grass with tables. There is  a small front porch with a couple of benches as well and people bring their dogs and have a beer out front.  Besides the excellent rotating 16 taps, featuring the best local and U.S. breweries, they have an extensive slection of bottles and cans to stay or to go. All the beer is stored cold and flies out of the coolers so you can be sure it's fresh. The selection is well curated.  On top of that the staff and customers are friendly and cool. It's a nice neighborhood spot even if you were not that into beer! You can always get cider here, I know they have some wine but it focuses on beer.  The grilled cheese sandwiches are pretty good too. Your guests will be impressed if you bring them here it is a five star beer place and a five star neighborhood bar.

Great little spot in crown heights! They have a beautiful outdoor space in the back (with grass!) And plenty of intimate seating inside. They are very family friendly and have some great (if limited) food options.
Killer beer selection, you won't find Blue moon here just a ton of beers that are different than anything you have ever had.
Quiet outdoor space, great selection of beers.
Best beer bar in the area!
really love this place, there are so many options. everyone that works here is awesome.
Beers and Cheese! What's not to like?
